original_text: So, if we have died with Christ, we believe that we will also live with him.
korean_text: 만일 우리가 그리스도와 함께 죽었으면 또한 그와 함께 살 줄을 믿노니

sentences.original_text: So, if we have died with Christ
we believe that we will also live with him
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그분과 함께 또한 살 것이라고 믿습니다
